DOC.brief_summary: Purpose study assessment interrectal distance dimension muscle lateral abdominal wall pregnant non-pregnant woman
DOC.detailed_description: - Purpose study assessment interrectal distance dimension muscle lateral abdominal wall pregnant non-pregnant woman - Assessment via ultrasound measurement transabdominally - 3 group participant : 1 . ) 20 pregnant woman , never pregnant ; 2 . ) 40 pregnant woman first pregnancy , follow course pregnancy ; 3 . ) 20 women1-5 day delivery ( 10 spontaneous delivery , 10 plan cesarean section ) - comparison pregnant non-pregnant woman ; evaluation influence pregnancy mode delivery
DOC.criteria: nonpregnant woman age 2045 BMI < 30 kg/m2 never pregnant pregnant woman age 2045 BMI < 30 kg/m2 pregnancy abdominal preoperations chronical lung disease constipation maternal collagenosis polyhydramnion ( AFI > 25 ) uterus fibroid > 10 cm inability perform Valsalva
